column5: I'm headed to the Tilted Toque this August with my kids. We're looking forward to a fun week! Any tips on swimming holes, fishing spots, jumping rocks, etc. would be much appreciated.
Hey MrSimon!Would you mind giving me a shout? 519-546-2431Terry

I just wanted to say, even though I haven't gone on this trip yet, so far the communication with Terry (the owner) has been great! I'll make sure to come back here after the trip and post a report and pictures.
Does anyone know if Casablanca Lodge on the upper French River is still operating? Looks like it was for sale, but not sure if it was purchased and up and running again.thanks

I know Brian has had his cabins up for sale for the last few years. I do not think the camp is operating anymore. I also see he has taken his website down.We used to stay at Casa Blanca years ago, but have been staying at Lunge Lodge the last 12 yrs. Check them out, great rates. www.lungelodge.ning.com
I know nothing about fishing but believe Casablanca is now under new ownership and runnng.

Yes everyone Casablanca is up and running again but with new owners. We are renting and selling cabins Give us a call at (705) 763 - 2160 Our website is http://casablancacabins.com/ Our facebook page is Casablanca Cabins Page Our email is [email protected] Hope to hear from you!
Casablanca was sold on an illegal sale and is currently for sale again. Per agents in the area
stayed there in 2012. was Brian's last guest. he got sick and is in a home.
We caught a 55" Musky just out front of Casablanca Lodge this summer. Funny enough we were fishing for walleye at the time with live minows. I love the French, you never know what's gonna hit next !!

Hey guys,I just want to chime in here and introduce myself. I purchased Casablanca Lodge on the Upper French River in the spring of 2018. The camp was extremely run down and nonoperational. Since then, we have cleaned up the property and have updated many of the cabins (still in progress). We are rebranded and operating as The Tilted Toque. If you know where the camp is (directly above Chaudiere Dam), you'll know how incredible the fishing is around our property. If you'd like to chat or have any questions, don't hesitate to get in touch. Cheers,Terry
Do you have a website? Fisherman 1792
